thesaurus.dc:description: Vocabulary to represent an agent's role within the context of the specific action.
thesaurus.dc:title: AgentActions role vocabulary

concept.dc:description: In botany, this is the collector listed first for a particular specimen. Each specimen has one primary collector. The primary collector assigns a number to that specimen from his/her own number series.
Obtaining a material entity for potential use as an input during an investigation.
